thread.section_title: Avas Flowers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Avas Flowers | avasflowers.com | 8 of 307
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text: I ordered flowers to be delivered to my grandmother. I put her neighbors address down by mistake but when she went to her neighbors house to ask about a delivery, the flowers weren't there. They sent a confirmation that they had been delivered around noon that day and there was no delivery at all to any of the neighbors in the area. The site does not give a lot of feedback or information about your delivery and customer service is nill. I've called several times and the times that I have gotten through I was put on hold for about a half hour.
